LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Blueprint_Install.label: LWM_DeepStorage (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Blueprint.label: LWM_DeepStorage (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Frame.label: LWM_DeepStorage (building)
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet.label: Pallet
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet_Blueprint.label: Pallet (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet_Blueprint_Install.label: Pallet (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet_Frame.label: Pallet (building)
LanguageData.LWM_Pallet_Frame.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.
LanguageData.PalletSmall.label: Small Pallet
LanguageData.PalletSmall.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.
LanguageData.PalletSmall_Blueprint.label: Small Pallet (blueprint)
LanguageData.PalletSmall_Blueprint_Install.label: Small Pallet (blueprint)
LanguageData.PalletSmall_Frame.label: Small Pallet (building)
LanguageData.PalletSmall_Frame.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.
LanguageData.PalletRack.label: PalletRack
LanguageData.PalletRack.description: A large warehouse shelving unit complete with pallets which allows you to stack stacks of things. More organized and easier to use than plain old pallets and it's the only feasible way of stacking large items like stone chunks and even other buildings.
LanguageData.PalletRack_Blueprint.label: PalletRack (blueprint)
LanguageData.PalletRack_Blueprint_Install.label: PalletRack (blueprint)
LanguageData.PalletRack_Frame.label: PalletRack (building)
LanguageData.PalletRack_Frame.description: A large warehouse shelving unit complete with pallets which allows you to stack stacks of things. More organized and easier to use than plain old pallets and it's the only feasible way of stacking large items like stone chunks and even other buildings.
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Skip.label: Skip
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Skip.description: A large metal bin. Best for storing big, heavy items unless you want to spend hours rooting around for that missing sock - it's easier to find when it's still attached to the body. These skips are not covered; they are open to the weather, but sturdier than a pallet.
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Skip_Blueprint.label: Skip (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Skip_Frame.label: Skip (building)
LanguageData.LWM_DeepStorage_Skip_Frame.description: A large metal bin. Best for storing big, heavy items unless you want to spend hours rooting around for that missing sock - it's easier to find when it's still attached to the body. These skips are not covered; they are open to the weather, but sturdier than a pallet.
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf.label: Wall shelves
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing things. Looks nice and doesn't impede traffic.
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf_Blueprint.label: Wall shelves (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf_Blueprint_Install.label: Wall shelves (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf_Frame.label: Wall shelves (building)
LanguageData.LWM_BigShelf_Frame.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing things. Looks nice and doesn't impede traffic.
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf.label: Utility Racks
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf.description: A fairly sturdy set of wire racks for storing things. More organized than pallets.
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf_Blueprint.label: Utility Racks (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf_Blueprint_Install.label: Utility Racks (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf_Frame.label: Utility Racks (building)
LanguageData.LWM_VeryBigShelf_Frame.description: A fairly sturdy set of wire racks for storing things. More organized than pallets.
LanguageData.DisplayCase.label: display case
LanguageData.DisplayCase.description: A glass case for showing off your wares to guests.
LanguageData.DisplayCase_Blueprint.label: display case (blueprint)
LanguageData.DisplayCase_Blueprint_Install.label: display case (blueprint)
LanguageData.DisplayCase_Frame.label: display case (building)
LanguageData.DisplayCase_Frame.description: A glass case for showing off your wares to guests.
LanguageData.Basket.label: Wicker basket
LanguageData.Basket.description: A woven container made typically of plant matierals, but may also be fashioned with synthetic ingredients. Can store just about anything, protects from the elements, and does well keeping fruits and veggies fresh by reducing spoilage by 30%.
LanguageData.Basket_Blueprint.label: Wicker basket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Basket_Blueprint_Install.label: Wicker basket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Basket_Frame.label: Wicker basket (building)
LanguageData.Basket_Frame.description: A woven container made typically of plant matierals, but may also be fashioned with synthetic ingredients. Can store just about anything, protects from the elements, and does well keeping fruits and veggies fresh by reducing spoilage by 30%.
LanguageData.Barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Barrel.description: A barrel made of wood or metal. Used to store various things inside, though easier to manage when it's all that same type of thing. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.Barrel_Blueprint_Install.label: barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.Barrel_Frame.label: barrel (building)
LanguageData.Barrel_Frame.description: A barrel made of wood or metal. Used to store various things inside, though easier to manage when it's all that same type of thing. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Chest.label: chest
LanguageData.Chest.description: A chest with compartments for quicker organization. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.Chest_Blueprint.label: chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chest_Blueprint_Install.label: chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chest_Frame.label: chest (building)
LanguageData.Chest_Frame.description: A chest with compartments for quicker organization. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.IndustrialChest.label: armored chest
LanguageData.IndustrialChest.description: An armored chest made of metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.IndustrialChest_Blueprint.label: armored chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.IndustrialChest_Blueprint_Install.label: armored chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.IndustrialChest_Frame.label: armored chest (building)
LanguageData.IndustrialChest_Frame.description: An armored chest made of metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.BinRack.label: Bin rack
LanguageData.BinRack.description: A cabinet of bins with lids. They slide out and open with ease and are labelled for optimum organization. Lightning fast.
LanguageData.BinRack_Blueprint.label: Bin rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.BinRack_Blueprint_Install.label: Bin rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.BinRack_Frame.label: Bin rack (building)
LanguageData.BinRack_Frame.description: A cabinet of bins with lids. They slide out and open with ease and are labelled for optimum organization. Lightning fast.
LanguageData.Shed.label: shed
LanguageData.Shed.description: An all purpose shed. You can store your tools, use it as a pantry, or hide the bodies. Has shelves and hangers for better organization. Slows spoilage by 25%.
LanguageData.Shed_Blueprint.label: shed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shed_Blueprint_Install.label: shed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shed_Frame.label: shed (building)
LanguageData.Shed_Frame.description: An all purpose shed. You can store your tools, use it as a pantry, or hide the bodies. Has shelves and hangers for better organization. Slows spoilage by 25%.
LanguageData.Pot.label: pot
LanguageData.Pot.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 40%.
LanguageData.Pot_Blueprint.label: pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.Pot_Blueprint_Install.label: pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.label: pot (building)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 40%.
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook.label: Meat Hook
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook.description:
A tall metal frame with several hooks hanging from chains. A simple crank allows hoisting several hanging things into the air. A way to store the dead bodies of fellow animals you have killed, before cutting them up and consuming their flesh. You monster.
Note that you can only fit so many giant corpses into one space, even if you stack them. The frame will only hold so much weight.
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook_Blueprint.label: Meat Hook (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook_Blueprint_Install.label: Meat Hook (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook_Frame.label: Meat Hook (building)
LanguageData.LWM_Meat_Hook_Frame.description:
A tall metal frame with several hooks hanging from chains. A simple crank allows hoisting several hanging things into the air. A way to store the dead bodies of fellow animals you have killed, before cutting them up and consuming their flesh. You monster.
Note that you can only fit so many giant corpses into one space, even if you stack them. The frame will only hold so much weight.
LanguageData.FeedingBowl.label: feeding bowl
LanguageData.FeedingBowl.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Blueprint.label: feeding bowl (blueprint)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Blueprint_Install.label: feeding bowl (blueprint)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Frame.label: feeding bowl (building)
LanguageData.FeedingBowl_Frame.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!
LanguageData.FabricHamperSingle.label: Hamper
LanguageData.FabricHamperSingle.description: This is a smaller hamper made out of fabric with a lid for protecting the contents. On the glitterworlds, it's used for collecting dirty laundry, but out here on the Rim, it's more commonly used by farmers and gatherers to drop off their harvests.
LanguageData.FabricHamperSingle_Blueprint.label: Hamper (blueprint)
LanguageData.FabricHamperSingle_Frame.label: Hamper (building)
LanguageData.FabricHamperSingle_Frame.description: This is a smaller hamper made out of fabric with a lid for protecting the contents. On the glitterworlds, it's used for collecting dirty laundry, but out here on the Rim, it's more commonly used by farmers and gatherers to drop off their harvests.
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft.label: Hay barn
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft.description: This structure can be used to store hay, silage, and various other plant materials to keep it dry and protect it from the weather.
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft_Blueprint.label: Hay barn (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft_Blueprint_Install.label: Hay barn (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft_Frame.label: Hay barn (building)
LanguageData.LWM_Hayloft_Frame.description: This structure can be used to store hay, silage, and various other plant materials to keep it dry and protect it from the weather.
LanguageData.Shelf.label: Clothing Rack
LanguageData.Shelf.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements.
LanguageData.Shelf_Blueprint.label: Clothing Rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shelf_Blueprint_Install.label: Clothing Rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shelf_Frame.label: Clothing Rack (building)
LanguageData.Shelf_Frame.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements.
LanguageData.SmallClothingRack.label: Small Clothing Rack
LanguageData.SmallClothingRack.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements. Hold considerably less than the larger version, but good for displaying.
LanguageData.SmallClothingRack_Blueprint.label: Small Clothing Rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.SmallClothingRack_Frame.label: Small Clothing Rack (building)
LanguageData.SmallClothingRack_Frame.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements. Hold considerably less than the larger version, but good for displaying.
LanguageData.RootCellar.label: root cellar
LanguageData.RootCellar.description: A cellar dug into the ground to keep produce cool and dry. Reduces spoilage by 40%. Slow to store and retrieve items, since it takes a bit of time to "root" around in there. Can store up to 27 items but takes of 3x3 space.
LanguageData.RootCellar_Blueprint.label: root cellar (blueprint)
LanguageData.RootCellar_Frame.label: root cellar (building)
LanguageData.RootCellar_Frame.description: A cellar dug into the ground to keep produce cool and dry. Reduces spoilage by 40%. Slow to store and retrieve items, since it takes a bit of time to "root" around in there. Can store up to 27 items but takes of 3x3 space.
LanguageData.BarShelf.label: Mounted Bar Shelf
LanguageData.BarShelf.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing bottles and jars. Perfect for that crampt space behind a bar.
LanguageData.BarShelf_Blueprint.label: Mounted Bar Shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.BarShelf_Blueprint_Install.label: Mounted Bar Shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.BarShelf_Frame.label: Mounted Bar Shelf (building)
LanguageData.BarShelf_Frame.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing bottles and jars. Perfect for that crampt space behind a bar.
LanguageData.Sack.label: Tow Sack
LanguageData.Sack.description: A woven bag for filling with rice, potatoes, sand, assorted lengths of wire, etc. Quick to use if you only fill it with one kind of thing. Reduces spoilage by 25%.
LanguageData.Sack_Blueprint.label: Tow Sack (blueprint)
LanguageData.Sack_Blueprint_Install.label: Tow Sack (blueprint)
LanguageData.Sack_Frame.label: Tow Sack (building)
LanguageData.Sack_Frame.description: A woven bag for filling with rice, potatoes, sand, assorted lengths of wire, etc. Quick to use if you only fill it with one kind of thing. Reduces spoilage by 25%.
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle.label: serving table
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle.description: A small table for keeping meals fresh, complete with sneeze-guard.
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle_Blueprint.label: serving table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle_Blueprint_Install.label: serving table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle_Frame.label: serving table (building)
LanguageData.TrayRackSingle_Frame.description: A small table for keeping meals fresh, complete with sneeze-guard.
LanguageData.FoodDisplayCounter.label: food display counter
LanguageData.FoodDisplayCounter.description: A glass case for displaying meals, baked goods, or even drugs, and helps keep them fresh longer.
LanguageData.FoodDisplayCounter_Blueprint.label: food display counter (blueprint)
LanguageData.FoodDisplayCounter_Frame.label: food display counter (building)
LanguageData.FoodDisplayCounter_Frame.description: A glass case for displaying meals, baked goods, or even drugs, and helps keep them fresh longer.
LanguageData.LWM_Medicine_Cabinet.label: Medical cart
LanguageData.LWM_Medicine_Cabinet.description: A cart for quickly organizing medicine and sanitation materials. Makes it easier to keep exam rooms clean.
LanguageData.LWM_Medicine_Cabinet_Blueprint.label: Medical cart (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_Medicine_Cabinet_Frame.label: Medical cart (building)
LanguageData.LWM_Medicine_Cabinet_Frame.description: A cart for quickly organizing medicine and sanitation materials. Makes it easier to keep exam rooms clean.
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsCabinet.label: Weapons Cabinet
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsCabinet.description: A sturdy cabinet for storing multiple weapons. A must-have furniture item for any hunting lodge. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsCabinet_Blueprint.label: Weapons Cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsCabinet_Frame.label: Weapons Cabinet (building)
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsCabinet_Frame.description: A sturdy cabinet for storing multiple weapons. A must-have furniture item for any hunting lodge. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsLocker.label: Weapons Locker
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsLocker.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsLocker_Blueprint.label: Weapons Locker (blueprint)
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsLocker_Frame.label: Weapons Locker (building)
LanguageData.LWM_WeaponsLocker_Frame.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.label: ammo storage
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.description: Stores ammo; prevents deterioration. Up to 9 items.
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Blueprint.label: ammo storage (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Frame.label: ammo storage (building)
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Frame.descriptio: Stores ammo; prevents deterioration. Up to 9 items.
LanguageData.Storage_ExplosiveContainer.label: armored ammo box
LanguageData.Storage_ExplosiveContainer.description: Stores and protects ammo; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.
LanguageData.Storage_ExplosiveContainer_Frame.label: armored ammo box (building)
LanguageData.Storage_ExplosiveContainer_Frame.descrip: Stores and protects ammo; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.label: vault safe
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.description: Strong and secure safe which protects dangerous or valuable items in case of disaster. Flame-proof, and nearly explosion-proof, but can still be destroyed by conventional methods. Stores up to 8 items...slowly.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Blueprint.label: vault safe (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Blueprint_Install.label: vault safe (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Frame.label: vault safe (building)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Frame.description: Strong and secure safe which protects dangerous or valuable items in case of disaster. Flame-proof, and nearly explosion-proof, but can still be destroyed by conventional methods. Stores up to 8 items...slowly.
LanguageData.TextileRack.label: Textile rack
LanguageData.TextileRack.description: Bins and hangers for storing bolts of textile.
LanguageData.TextileRack_Blueprint.label: Textile rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.TextileRack_Blueprint_Install.label: Textile rack (blueprint)
LanguageData.TextileRack_Frame.label: Textile rack (building)
LanguageData.TextileRack_Frame.description: Bins and hangers for storing bolts of textile.
LanguageData.Commode.label: wardrobe
LanguageData.Commode.description: A dresser for colonists to store and organize their clothes.
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint.label: wardrobe (blueprint)
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint_Install.label: wardrobe (blueprint)
LanguageData.Commode_Frame.label: wardrobe (building)
LanguageData.Commode_Frame.description: A dresser for colonists to store and organize their clothes.
